ComicInfo.Summary: This epic "No Way Out" story arc starts here! A herd surrounds Alexandria and the community turns to Rick in their desperation. This deluxe presentation in STUNNING FULL COLOR also features another installment of Cutting Room Floor and creator commentary.
ComicInfo.Characters: Douglas Monroe,Spencer,Olivia,Abraham Ford,Tobin,Michonne,Bruce,Ron Anderson,Andrea,Maggie Greene,Mikey,Glenn,Rick Grimes,Eugene Porter,Gabriel Stokes,Rosita Espinosa,Carl Grimes,Nicholas,Aaron,Jessie,Eric,Heath,Josh,Sophia,Morgan Jones,Holly
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charlie Adlard,Dave McCaig,David Finch,Marcelo Maiolo,Mateus Santolouco
